complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Next.js Project with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Next.js project setup into individual configuration steps, focusing on each tool installation, configuration file setup, and project structure creation as separate actionable subtasks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity due to multiple tool integrations and configurations, but well-documented processes. Each step in the details can become a focused subtask.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Configure Domain, Hosting, and SSL on Vercel
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate domain registration, DNS configuration, Vercel setup, SSL implementation, and deployment pipeline configuration into distinct subtasks with clear verification steps.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving external services and DNS propagation. Dependencies on domain registrar and potential troubleshooting needs increase complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Core Layout and Navigation Structure
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for each component (Header, Footer, Navigation, MobileMenu), responsive design implementation, accessibility features, and routing setup as separate development phases.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Higher complexity due to responsive design requirements, accessibility considerations, and multiple component interactions. Critical foundation component affecting all other pages.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Homepage with Core Value Proposition
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into hero section creation, individual value proposition sections, service overview cards, CTA implementation, animations, and mobile optimization as separate development tasks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to content strategy, multiple interactive elements, animations, and critical business impact. Requires careful UX design and conversion optimization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for template design, content creation for each of the 6 services, dynamic routing setup, service-specific components, and individual page optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to 6 different service pages requiring unique content, consistent template design, and service-specific customizations. Significant content development effort.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Contact Form with Backend Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate form UI creation, validation implementation, API route development, email service integration, database setup, security measures, and error handling into focused backend and frontend subtasks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving full-stack development, third-party integrations (SendGrid, Supabase), security considerations, and multiple failure points requiring robust error handling.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement SEO Optimization and Meta Tags
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for meta tag implementation, structured data creation, sitemap generation, robots.txt configuration, image optimization, and internal linking strategy.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity requiring SEO expertise, technical implementation across multiple pages, and ongoing optimization. Critical for organic traffic generation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Google Analytics and Performance Monitoring
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into GA4 setup, conversion tracking configuration, event implementation, GTM integration, privacy compliance, and performance monitoring as separate integration tasks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with multiple third-party service integrations and privacy considerations. Requires understanding of analytics and compliance requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create About Us Page and Company Information
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate content creation, company statistics gathering, team section development, timeline component creation, and page styling into content and development focused subtasks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity primarily involving content creation and standard page development. Less technical complexity but requires significant content strategy and copywriting.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Testimonials and Social Proof System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for database schema design, testimonial components, carousel implementation, case study template, dynamic routing, admin interface planning, and structured data implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving database design, multiple component types, dynamic content management, and future admin interface considerations. Significant data modeling required.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set up Content Management System Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into CMS selection and setup, content type creation, API integration, blog functionality, search implementation, content workflow setup, and deployment pipeline configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving major architectural decisions, extensive API integration, blog system development, and content management workflows. Significant impact on future content operations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Performance Optimization and Security Measures
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for performance optimization, security header implementation, accessibility compliance, error handling, monitoring setup, legal page creation, and GDPR compliance measures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity covering multiple specialized areas: performance, security, accessibility, and compliance. Requires expertise in each domain and comprehensive testing across all areas.
